SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayCard, StartCard
public abstract class Card extends Object implements Drawable, Serializable
Abstract representation of in-game cards Holds methods and parameters that helps handle and generate every card in the game. Cards are immutable objects, allowing to create a single object for each card in the game and reuse the same set of object for all the games.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getTopLeftCorner

      public final Corner getTopLeftCorner(boolean onBackSide)
      Retrieves the top-left corner of the currently shown face of the card.

      It uses the getCorner method so that subclasses only needs to redefine that method and not the four get[Top/Bottom][Left/right]Corner() methods.

      Returns:
      the top-left corner, null if the corner is hidden

    • getTopRightCorner

      public final Corner getTopRightCorner(boolean onBackSide)

      It uses the getCorner method so that subclasses only needs to redefine that method and not the four get[Top/Bottom][Left/right]Corner() methods.

      Returns:
      the top-right corner, null if the corner is hidden
